name: Octo-Punch
description:
---Menu is out of proportion when not in full screen---

Octo-Punch, made over the course of 7 days for the 30th Curdle Jam, is a 2D platformer where you roll a big ball and use it's attached punching gloves to bounce yourself around. Make it to the end of each of the 6 levels and collect the golden gloves to progress through the game. Watch out for the spikes!

CONTROLS: 

Left Arrow: Roll left

Right Arrow: Roll right

Space: Extend punching gloves (jump)

M: Go to main menu

R: Restart current level

-------------------------------------------------------------------------

The moving platforms are a little janky so sorry in advance.

Enjoy!
